content: lion brand pattern # 70456ad corrections applied jan 14 2008 skill level easy level 2 babysoft® article #920 4 colors 1 ball each *pastel pink pistachio pink lemonade violet* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm gauge 1 square = 9-3/4 in 25 cm in pattern stitch pattern provides 4 different colorways make 12 squares total sew squares together to finish as shown in assembly diagram see 90103ad cheerful squares baby throw 1 for the lb collection® cotton bamboo article #487 version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cheerful-squares-baby-throw
